name: Basic Replication
description: A starter template demonstrating core control over variants and properties using @Replicate.Model and @Replicate.Property.

name: Schema Versioning
description: A starter template showing how to evolve models safely using a versioned, sealed hierarchy.

name: Serializable Integration
description: A starter template illustrating how to apply `kotlinx.serialization` annotations to generated DTOs.

name: Contextual Nesting
description: A starter template showing how KReplica intelligently handles nested replicated models across different variants.

name: Hide Annotation
description: A starter template demonstrating how to use @Replicate.Hide to temporarily disable code generation for a model.
